TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PrinterSettings extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable

summary.span: 指定從 Windows Form 應用程式列印時，文件如何列印的相關資訊，包括用來列印的印表機。

span.span: Specifies information about how a document is printed, including the printer that prints it, when printing from a Windows Forms application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，您存取經由或修改印表機設定的屬性。Typically, you access a through or properties to modify printer settings. 最常見的 [印表機] 設定，指定要列印至印表機。The most common printer setting is , which specifies the printer to print to. 如需有關使用 Windows Form 列印的詳細資訊，請參閱命名空間概觀。For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the namespace overview. 如果您想要從 Windows Presentation Foundation 應用程式列印，請參閱命名空間。If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會在指定的印表機上列印文件。The following code example prints a document on the specified printer. 此範例包含三個必要條件：The example has three prerequisites: - 名為的變數`filePath`已列印設定檔案的路徑。A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print. - 名為的方法`pd_PrintPage`，以處理已定義事件。A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the event, has been defined. - 名為的變數`printer`已設為印表機的名稱。A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name. 使用， ，和此範例中的命名空間。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrinterSettings Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrinterSettings Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrinterSettings Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設建構函式會初始化為其預設值的所有欄位。The default constructor initializes all fields to their default values. 一般而言，您未建立的執行個體，而是使用設定印表機設定。Typically, you do not create an instance of , but instead use the to set settings for the printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用雙工、 列印，且如果印表機支援此功能，設定的其中一個值。To print using duplex, and if the printer supports it, set to one of the values.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出列印文件是否要分頁。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printed document is collated.

value.span: 如果列印的文件被分頁，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the printed document is collated; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定序的份數大於 1 時，才執行。Collating is performed only when the number of copies is greater than 1. 設定屬性來指定要列印的份數。Set the property to specify the number of copies to print. 設定至`true`會在下一步複製的第一頁列印之前，先列印文件的完整複本。Setting to `true` will print a complete copy of the document before the first page of the next copy is printed. `false` 將每一頁列印再列印下一個頁面中指定的複本數目。`false` will print each page by the number of copies specified before printing the next page.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property short Copies { short get(); void set(short value); };
member this.Copies : int16 with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定文件列印的份數。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of copies of the document to print.

value.span: 要列印的份數。

span.span: The number of copies to print.

value.span: 預設為 1。

span.span: The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 並非所有的印表機支援列印多個複本。Not all printers support printing multiple copes. 您可以使用屬性來判斷的最大數目複製印表機支援。You can use the property to determine the maximum number of copies the printer supports. 如果複本數目設定高於印表機所支援的最大複本，將會列印只有最大複本數目，並會發生任何例外狀況。If the number of copies is set higher than the maximum copies supported by the printer, only the maximum number of copies will be printed, and no exception will occur. > [!NOTE] > 部分印表機可能不支援列印一份以上一次。Some printers might not support printing more than one copy at a time.

span.span: The value of the property is less than zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有方法中，您可以取得的印表機，而不需要建立列印工作。With the method, you can obtain a for the printer without creating a print job. 您可以使用來決定如何配置視覺元素，例如字型、 大小和複雜的列印工作的型別樣式。You can use the to make decisions on how to layout visual elements like fonts, sizes, and type styles of a complex print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 並屬性由當使用者選取列印範圍。The and properties are used by the when the user selects a print range. 屬性必須設為`true`，讓使用者指定的列印範圍。The property must be set to `true` to enable the user to specify a print range. 颾魤 ㄛ需要並來指定和到該範圍內的值。In addition, the requires the and to be specified and the value to be within that range. 在列印的過程中，在事件、 檢視來決定要列印功能。During the printing process, in the event, view the to determine what should be printed. 如果已，使用和應該列印屬性，以決定哪些頁面。If is , use the and properties to determine what pages should be printed. 如果是，然後指定所選頁面的輸出。If is , then specify output only for the selected pages. ，並也可以設定以程式設計的方式，不過實作都相同。The , and can also be set programmatically, though the implementation is the same.

span.span: The property's value is less than zero.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance native int GetHdevmode() cil managed

summary.span: 建立對應到印表機設定的 結構的控制代碼。

span.span: Creates a handle to a structure that corresponds to the printer settings.
A handle to a structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DEVMODE` 結構是特定的裝置。`DEVMODE` structures are device specific. 複製`DEVMODE`從其中一個結構到不支援不同的印表機。Copying a `DEVMODE` structure from one to a for a different printer is not supported. 當您完成建立透過這個方法的控制代碼時，您必須將其解除配置自行呼叫原生 Win32`GlobalFree`方法。When you are done with the handle that is created through this method, you must deallocate it yourself by calling the native Win32 `GlobalFree` method. 當您呼叫這個方法時，您將傳遞做為參數的傳回值方法。When you call this method, you pass as a parameter the return value from the method.

span.span: The printer's initialization information could not be retrieved.

span.span: for printing and access to all printers on the network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DEVMODE` 結構是特定的裝置。`DEVMODE` structures are device specific. 複製`DEVMODE`從其中一個結構到不支援不同的印表機。Copying a `DEVMODE` structure from one to a for a different printer is not supported. 當您完成建立透過這個方法的控制代碼時，您必須將其解除配置自行呼叫原生 Win32`GlobalFree`方法。When you are done with the handle that is created through this method, you must deallocate it yourself by calling the native Win32 `GlobalFree` method. 當您呼叫這個方法時，您將傳遞做為參數的傳回值方法。When you call this method, you pass as a parameter the return value from the method.

value.span: ，表示安裝於電腦上的所有印表機名稱。

span.span: A that represents the names of all printers installed on the computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用已安裝的印表機名稱的集合，讓使用者選擇来列印至印表機。You can use the collection of installed printer names to provide the user a choice of printers to print to. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會填入`comboInstalledPrinters`下拉式方塊的已安裝的印表機，還會設定要列印，請使用印表機屬性中，選取變更時。The following code example populates the `comboInstalledPrinters` combo box with the installed printers and also sets the printer to print, using the property, when the selection changes. `PopulateInstalledPrintersCombo`正在初始化表單時，會呼叫常式。The `PopulateInstalledPrintersCombo` routine is called when the form is being initialized. 這個範例需要名為變數`printDoc`存在和特定的下拉式方塊存在。The example requires that a variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo box exists. [!code-cpp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CPP/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/VB/source.vb#5)]

span.span: if the printer is a plotter; if the printer is a raster.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繪圖機是以向量為基礎，而不是點陣印表機。A plotter is a printer that is vector-based as opposed to raster-based. 大部分以向量為基礎的印表機會使用個別的繪圖筆來產生輸出。Most vector-based printers use individual plotting pens to produce output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您取得或設定一些屬性時，有效的印表機，否則會引發例外狀況。When you get or set some properties, a valid printer is required or else an exception is raised. 若要避免例外狀況，請使用屬性設定後的來安全地判斷印表機是否有效。To avoid exceptions, use the property after setting the to safely determine if the printer is valid. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會藉由設定指定目標印表機屬性，而且如果是`true`，在指定的印表機上列印文件。The following code example specifies the target printer by setting the property, and if the is `true`, prints the document on the specified printer. 此範例包含三個必要條件：The example has three prerequisites: - 名為的變數`filePath`已列印設定檔案的路徑。A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print. - 名為的方法`pd_PrintPage`，以處理已定義事件。A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the event, has been defined. - 名為的變數`printer`已設為印表機的名稱。A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name. 使用， ，和此範例中的命名空間。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrinterSettings Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrinterSettings Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrinterSettings Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LandscapeAngle As Integer
public: property int LandscapeAngle { int get(); };

summary.span: 以度數為單位，取得將縱向列印旋轉以產生橫向列印的角度。

span.span: Gets the angle, in degrees, that the portrait orientation is rotated to produce the landscape orientation.

value.span: 這個角度以度數為單位，將縱向列印旋轉以產生橫向列印。

span.span: The angle, in degrees, that the portrait orientation is rotated to produce the landscape orientation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效的旋轉的值為 90 和 270 度。Valid rotation values are 90 and 270 degrees. 如果不支援橫向，唯一有效的旋轉值會是 0 度。If landscape is not supported, the only valid rotation value is 0 degrees. 您設定屬性設`true`列印橫印格式的頁面。You set the property to `true` to print a page in landscape format.

summary.span: 取得印表機可讓使用者單次列印的最大複本數目。

span.span: Gets the maximum number of copies that the printer enables the user to print at a time.

value.span: 印表機可讓使用者單次列印的最大複本數目。

span.span: The maximum number of copies that the printer enables the user to print at a time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定要列印的份數的屬性。Set the property to the number of copies to print. 使用屬性來判斷您的印表機是否支援一次列印多個複本，因為某些印表機不執行。Use the property to determine if your printer supports printing multiple copies at a time, because some printers do not.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PaperSizes As PrinterSettings.PaperSizeCollection

summary.span: 取得這個印表機支援的紙張大小。

span.span: Gets the paper sizes that are supported by this printer.

value.span: ，表示印表機支援的紙張大小。

span.span: A that represents the paper sizes that are supported by this printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含執行個體，表示紙張大小，透過屬性，其中包含的其中一個值。The contains instances that represent the paper sizes through the property, which contains one of the values. 一般而言，您可以設定透過頁面的紙張大小屬性設為有效可透過集合。Typically, you set a page's paper size through the property to a valid available through the collection. 若要指定自訂紙張大小，請參閱建構函式。To specify a custom paper size, see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會填入`comboPaperSize`印表機與 seznamem 支援的紙張大小。The following code example populates the `comboPaperSize` combo box with the printer's supported paper sizes. 此外，自訂紙張大小建立並加入至下拉式方塊。In addition, a custom paper size is created and added to the combo box. 識別為要透過加入項目提供的顯示字串的屬性下拉式方塊的屬性。The is identified as the property that provides the display string for the item being added through the property of the combo box. 這個範例需要名為變數`printDoc`存在和特定的下拉式方塊存在。The example requires that a variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo box exists. summary.span: 取得或設定要使用的印表機名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the printer to use.

value.span: 要使用的印表機名稱。

span.span: The name of the printer to use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定印表機名稱之後, 呼叫來判斷是否印表機名稱辨識為有效的印表機在系統上。After setting the printer name, call to determine if the printer name is recognized as a valid printer on the system. 您也可以使用屬性來取得系統上安裝的印表機清單。You can also use the property to get a list of printers installed on the system. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會藉由設定指定目標印表機屬性，而且如果是`true`，在指定的印表機上列印文件。The following code example specifies the target printer by setting the property, and if the is `true`, prints the document on the specified printer. 此範例包含三個必要條件：The example has three prerequisites: - 名為的變數`filePath`已列印設定檔案的路徑。A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print. - 名為的方法`pd_PrintPage`，以處理已定義事件。A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the event, has been defined. - 名為的變數`printer`已設為印表機的名稱。A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name. 使用， ，和此範例中的命名空間。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrinterSettings Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrinterSettings Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrinterSettings Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定使用者指定要列印的頁碼。

value.span: 其中一個 值。

span.span: One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性由。 當使用者選取某個列印的範圍。The property is used by the .when the user selects a print range. 預設的 是 `AllPages`。The default is `AllPages`. 若要讓使用者指定要列印的頁面範圍屬性必須設為`true`。To enable the user to specify a range of pages to print, the property must be set to `true`. 若要讓使用者指定要列印選取的頁面屬性必須設為`true`。To enable the user to specify the selected pages to print, the property must be set to `true`. 在列印的過程中，在事件、 檢視來決定要列印功能。During the printing process, in the event, view the to determine what should be printed. 如果已，使用和應該列印屬性，以決定哪些頁面。If is , use the and properties to determine what pages should be printed. 如果是，然後指定所選頁面的輸出。If is , then specify output only for the selected pages. ，並也可以設定以程式設計的方式，不過實作都相同。The , and can also be set programmatically, though the implementation is the same.

exception.span: 屬性的值不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The value of the property is not one of the values.

span.span: if the printing output is sent to a file; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性由當使用者選取**列印到檔案**選項。The property is used by the when the user selects the **Print to file** option. 在此情況下，輸出連接埠設定為 「 檔案 」 造成 Windows 列印子系統，以提示使用者輸入檔案名稱時呼叫方法。In such a case, the output port is set to "FILE," causing the Windows printing subsystem to prompt the user for a file name when the method is called. > [!NOTE] > 屬性只供，而且無法以程式設計方式設定。The property is only used by the and cannot be set programmatically. `Print to file`選項才會出現在當屬性設定為`true`。The `Print to file` option only appears on the when the property is set to `true`.
